ACTIVATE_FIREFOX_PAGE_ATTENTION.message: To start using Alitools, please review the following information:

ACTIVATE_FIREFOX_PAGE_DESCRIPTION_ITEM_1.message:
We use technical data, which includes the IP address, date and time of use of Alitools, language, information about the OS and browser type. This data is needed to ensure that Alitools is working
correctly, prevent fraud and configure the product for you.

ACTIVATE_FIREFOX_PAGE_DESCRIPTION_ITEM_2.message:
We use cookies to authorize you and automatically configure your profile. In our functions we use
the links of affiliate programs of AliExpress and other partner stores.

ACTIVATE_FIREFOX_PAGE_DESCRIPTION_ITEM_3.message:
Alitools collects the following personal information: URLs of visited pages on a limited list of sites
for functioning of «History», first-level domains on a limited list of sites for functioning of «Search
for goods» and «Favorite stores» and first-level domains when the «Search by picture» icon is
displayed on all sites. The detailed information about data collection can be found in the
. All data is sent to the server in encrypted form.

ACTIVATE_FIREFOX_PAGE_DESCRIPTION_ITEM_4.message:
We strive to make Alitools better for all of our users. To do this we use Google Analytics,
Yandex.Metrika and Facebook Pixel to collect information about how you use Alitools.

ACTIVATE_FIREFOX_PAGE_DISABLE_PERSONAL_A.message:
Prohibit the collection of personal
of analytical data.

ACTIVATE_FIREFOX_PAGE_DISABLE_NOT_PERSON.message:
Prohibit the collection of technical
of analytical data.

ACTIVATE_SAFARI_PAGE_STEP_1_1.message:
A yellow triangle means that the extension isn't active.
Click on the icon to fix it:

ACTIVATE_SAFARI_PAGE_STEP_1_2.message:
Select «Always Allow on Every Website...»
in the menu that opens.

ACTIVATE_SAFARI_PAGE_STEP_1_4.message: You have no yellow triangle and the extension isn't active yet?${BR}$ Follow ${LINK}$.

ACTIVATE_SAFARI_PAGE_STEP_2_1.message:
Please, allow it to be visible on the websites you visit.
Follow the instructions on the pictures:

ACTIVATE_SAFARI_PAGE_STEP_2_2.message: The extension will activate automatically after you select «Always Allow on Every Website...».

ONBOARDING_CHART_TAB_DEMO_TEXT.message: Product options are not selected by default

ONBOARDING_CAT_CHART_TAB_DESC.message: Now you can see the price dynamics for a particular product’s model or option.

ONBOARDING_LANGUAGE_DESC.message: Make your shopping on Aliexpress more comfortable by switching on the Portuguese language in Alitools.

ANALYTICS_TOOLTIP_TEXT_1_PERSONAL.message: Browsing data, as well as access to and placement of cookies.

ANALYTICS_TOOLTIP_TEXT_2_PERSONAL.message: The core functionality of the add-on can work without collecting personal data - so you can either agree to the collection of data or refuse to collect data.

ANALYTICS_TOOLTIP_HEADER_NOT_PERSONAL.message: Technical data and user interaction data (opt-out)

ANALYTICS_TOOLTIP_TEXT_1_NOT_PERSONAL.message: User interaction data includes how the user interacts with our installed add-on, we collect metrics for product improvement, error information, etc.

ANALYTICS_TOOLTIP_TEXT_2_NOT_PERSONAL.message: The core functionality of the add-on can work without collecting technical data - so you can either agree to the collection of data or refuse to collect data.

ANALYTICS_TOOLTIP_POLICY.message: The consent experience is linked to the privacy policy posted on AMO, you can find more information at the
